channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-99] Creating child container from another box may cause Invalid BundleContext
item.description:
I installed Fuse ESB 7 beta1 on my Mac laptop.

On another box I have Windows XP, and I started Fuse IDE. I connected to the Mac OSX Fabric, and can browse the fabric from the windows box.
I then use the Fuse IDE to create a child container, and selected the Camel profile (eg karaf -> Camel).

And then a child container is being created on the Mac laptop, but it fails provision in the end with a ava.lang.IllegalStateException: Invalid BundleContext.
item.summary: Creating child container from another box may cause Invalid BundleContext

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
